titles.title: A bill to designate the Donner Trail and the Transcontinental Railroad Trail located in the State of Utah as study trails for potential designation as national historic trails.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 7/9/1987--Introduced. Amends the National Trails System Act to designate for study for inclusion in such System the Donner Trail, Utah, and the Transcontinental Railroad Trail, Utah.
